Kimbap making
Learn how to make beautiful artistic sushi

kimbap-making

Your local friend:

Ulla

About:

Ulla is a kimbap lover and she loves being artistic with her creations.

Course Details:

Location: Seoul, South Korea

Duration: 1 day

Level: Beginner

Price: $60 USD

What you'll learn:

Learn how to make beautiful kimbap, everything from picking the right kind of rice, to washing the rice and picking the ingredients.

Where we'll be:

Bali around Canggu, rice fields and Eco beach.

What I'll provide:

I can use my camera or you can bring yours and also we can edit in my lightroom if you don't have one set up yet.

Good to know

Make sure you have enough space on your laptop to install lightroom if you want to do that and also space on your memory card to take photos.
